message: I met up with Cordelia, who had refused to enter the Church and waited outside.
Cordelia seemed to feel bad for not coming in with us, and looked uneasy.

name: Cordelia
message: Welcome back, how was it？

name: Thomas
message: Not much to say about it.
Churches　are　the　same　everywhere,　you　know.

name: Thomas
message: On top of that, there’s absolutely nothing here.
No need to worry about thieves breaking into this Church, that's for sure.
We came to the Church of Dagon.
As usual, not a single believer is anywhere to be seen.
We're in front of the Church of Dagon.
It's not as scary as when I saw it in the dead of night, but still, it doesn't feel anything like a church.
With how creepy it looks, I doubt any painter would even want to pick up a brush.
Towering trees stand as if reaching up to the heavily overcast sky.
All the trees-firs and beeches alike-have been twisted in weird ways by the strong wind, casting an unpleasant shadow over the landscape that looks like something out of a painting.
With how creepy this scene is, no painter would want to pick up their brush.
It looks like a pretty old building, but it’s not exactly some valuable piece of architecture.
More than that, the atmosphere of the building itself stirs up a kind of hostile feeling. There's not even a hint of the majestic impression most churches have.

The man said something about the 'Dagon Cult', but I've never heard of such a group. It's probably just another shady new religion, but I can't understand why they'd set up their base in a countryside like this.
I wonder what this building is being used for.
The man who called himself Nai clearly said 'my Church,' but it seems to me that it has a different vibe from the Church I'm used to.
But the weirdest thing is, this building doesn't have any of the decorations typical of a church, like a cross or anything.

name: Thomas
message: Isn't there anywhere a bit more interesting?
This way, it ain't even sightseeing.

name: Thomas
message: The hell you lookin' at me like that for?
Do you really think I'd go for the donation box in a dumpy Church like this？

name: Jonathan
message: I didn't say anything, did I?
Why are you getting so uptight about it？

name: Thomas
message: You think I'm being neurotic？
No fucking way.

name: Jonathan
message: Fine by me then.
If you've got something shady going on, I'd be happier if you came clean about it sooner rather than later.

name: Thomas
message: Don't talk like some damn preacher.
I can't stand preachy folks.
Gardner told me to keep my mouth shut, but...
I wonder what connection Thomas has with this church.

name: Jonathan
message: Thomas, take a look at this.
There's some kind of ornament on top of the crest, it might be something pretty fancy.

name: Thomas
message: Which one？

name: Jonathan
message: Look closely, there's a stone relief on display.
Isn't this thing pretty old？

name: Gardner
message: Jonathan！

name: Thomas
message: What the hell... Something like that, it's not worth anything.
First off, it's fixed on so tight, I don't think I can take it off.
Doesn't change their expression at all.
Is this guy really cunning, or is he just plain dense......

name: Thomas
message: What a damn gloomy Church.
It might suit a village like this, though.

name: Jonathan
message: I can't believe this is just a church......
First off, there isn’t even a Cross standing in this Church.

name: Thomas
message: Isn't that just the pastor's hobby？
Isn't it fine if there's at least one dude like that around?

name: Jonathan
message: No way......
Besides,　I've　never　even　heard　of　a　Black　priest.

name: Thomas
message: Apparently, they've got those in America.
Sounds like a joke, though.

name: Jonathan
message: This is England, you know.
The Church of England isn't that flexible.

name: Thomas
message: Exactly right.
Trying to understand a king who faked adultery to divorce his wife and had her executed, just for that reason.

name: Jonathan
message: I feel like you might even be able to talk the cardinal into allowing polygamy.
Like Gardner said, it'd be better to keep quiet about us being suspicious of Thomas.

name: Gardner
message: Anyway, it's best not to let your guard down around Thomas.
Jonathan, don't take your eyes off that man.

name: Gardner
message: Jonathan, take a good look at the crest above the church door. You've seen that before, haven't you！

name: Jonathan
message: Which one？

name: Gardner
message: Look closely！
I looked in the direction Gardner nodded with his chin.
What was there was......

name: Jonathan
message: That is......

name: Gardner
message: You recognize that crest, don't you？

name: Jonathan
message: It's the same one that was on Thomas's ring！

name: Gardner
message: That's the Freemason's mark.

name: Jonathan
message: Why would you come to a church...
Does　Thomas　have　something　to　do　with　this　church　and　that　Black　priest　named　Nai　I　met？

name: Gardner
message: Even if that were the case, I wouldn't think it's strange！
No, Jonathan, hold back. We don't have to interrogate that man right now.

name: Jonathan
message: Why is that？
This is your chance to find out who Thomas really is.

name: Gardner
message: I don't think that guy would ever spill the truth.
More importantly, isn't it smarter to let them think we don't know anything？
Come to think of it......
When I came here before, there was a crest above the entrance of the Church.

name: Jonathan
message: Professor,　don't　you　recognize　the　crest　above　that　entrance？

name: Gardner
message: Which one is it.

name: Jonathan
message: Hey, look, over there......
Hold on a second, I feel like I've seen this somewhere before...

name: Gardner
message: That was......

name: Gardner
message: Jonathan, that's the mark of the Freemason！
You saw it too, right? The same crest was on Thomas's Ring.

name: Jonathan
message: I see, so that's what it was.
I've been weirdly curious about it since I saw it before.

name: Gardner
message: But why the hell is that emblem hanging in the Church, anyway?

name: Jonathan
message: Is there some kind of connection between this church, that black priest named Nai, and Thomas？

name: Gardner
message: Even if that were true, I wouldn’t find it strange！
No, Jonasan, hold it. You don't have to press that guy right now.

name: Jonathan
message: Why is that？
This is your chance to find out who Thomas really is.

name: Gardner
message: I can't believe that guy would actually spill the truth.
But wouldn't it be smarter to let them think we don't know anything？

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, sorry about this... If you guys are planning to go inside, is it okay if I wait here？

name: Jonathan
message: I don't really mind.
Alright, then let's just go by ourselves.
Somehow, being here makes me feel really uneasy.

name: Jonathan
message: What's wrong with you? This isn't like you.
If you stick with us, you won't have a thing to worry about.

name: Cordelia
message: Yeah...... It's strange, even to me.
It's not my first time coming here, and usually it's nothing at all　　　　　　　　so yeah.

name: Jonathan
message: Maybe you had a bad experience before, and it's making you feel afraid without even realizing it.

name: Cordelia
message: I don't remember anything like that though......
I don't know why, but my body just won't stop shaking.
